Sentencas: The powders of Sr- and Mg-doped lanthanum gallate (La0.85Sr0.15Ga0.80Mg0.2O2.825; LSGM) were synthesized by the Pechini method.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Sr- and Mg-doped Lanthanum gallate electrolyte materials prepared via the Pechini method

Sentencas: The XRD pattern indicates that the main phase (LaGaO3) exists in the uncalcined powders.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Sr- and Mg-doped Lanthanum gallate electrolyte materials prepared via the Pechini method

Sentencas: The LSGM materials are composed of the main phase without secondary phases when calcined at 1400 degrees C.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Sr- and Mg-doped Lanthanum gallate electrolyte materials prepared via the Pechini method

Sentencas: The LSGM materials contain fewer amounts of secondary phases than those prepared by the sol-gel method and solid-state reaction method at the same calcination temperature.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Sr- and Mg-doped Lanthanum gallate electrolyte materials prepared via the Pechini method

Sentencas: TEM image of the powders indicate that the average grain size is about 80 rim.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Sr- and Mg-doped Lanthanum gallate electrolyte materials prepared via the Pechini method

Sentencas: The conductivity increases with the testing temperature increasing.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Sr- and Mg-doped Lanthanum gallate electrolyte materials prepared via the Pechini method

Sentencas: The curve of 1n(sigma T)vs 1/T exists two straight lines intersecting at T-star (T-star is about 602 degrees C).
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Sr- and Mg-doped Lanthanum gallate electrolyte materials prepared via the Pechini method

Sentencas: It indicates that activation energy of oxygen-vacancy motion at lower temperatures is greater than that at higher temperatures.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Sr- and Mg-doped Lanthanum gallate electrolyte materials prepared via the Pechini method
Synthesis and characterization of Sr- and Mg-doped Lanthanum gallate electrolyte materials prepared via the Pechini method
